Translations.Text: He adama santana! Ma'i tomalokaka e'i marme nirdesa diya nachilone ye, tomaloke cayatanara ibadata nakaraiba, karana si tomalokara prakasya satrau
arau kerala morae'i ibadata karaa, e'itorae'i sarala patha
Arau cayatane tomalokara bahu dalaka bibhraanta karaichila, tathapi'o tomaloke anudharana karaa na'ine
e'itorae'i se'i jahannama, yara pratisrauti tomalokaka diya haichila
Tomaloke ye kupharai karaichila tara babe aji tomaloke iyata dagdha horaa
Aji ami sihamtara mukhata mohara marai dima, sihamtara hate amara lagata katha patiba arau sihamtara bharaiye saksya diba sihamtara krtakarmara
Arau ami iccha karaile arasye sihamtara cakuboraka lopa karai dilohemtena, tetiya sihamte patha anbesanata dauraile'o (kono kamata nahiba) karana kenekaino dekha paba
arau ami iccha karaile sihamtara nija nija sthanata sihamtara akrti paraibartana karai dilohemtena, phalata sihamte aguraa'iyo yaba noraarailehemtena arau ubhati'o ahiba noraarailehemtena
Arau ami yaka dirgha jirana dana karao, srsti arayabata tara aranati ghata'om. Tathapi'o sihamte buji napayane
ami te'omka (raachulaka) kabya racana karaa sikoraa na'i arau e'ito te'omra babe sobhaniya'o nahaya. Niscaya e'ito kerala eta upadesa arau suspasta kora'ana
yate i jiraitasakalaka satarka karaiba parae arau kaphirasakalara biraud'dhe sastira katha satya buli pramanita haya
Sihamte laksya karaa na'ine ye, amara haterae prastuta karaa bastusamuhara majata ami sihamtara babe gharaciya jantu'o srsti karaicho. Sihamte'i se'iborara malika
Arau ami se'iboraka sihamtara basibhuta karai dicho. Phalata se'iborara kichu sankhyaka haiche sihamtara bahana arau kichumanaka sihamte bhaksana karae
Arau sihamtara babe e'iborara majata ache bahuto upakara lagate ache paniya upadana. Tathapi'o sihamte krtajnata prakasa nakaraibane
athaca sihamte allahara paraibarte an'ya ilaha grahana karaiche, e'i asata ye, sihamte sahayyapraapta ha’ba
Kintu se'iborae sihamtaka sahaya karaibalai saksama nahaya, baram se'iboraka sihamtara biraud'dhe bahiniraupe upasthita karaa ha’ba
Eteke sihamtara kathaya yena tomaka cintita nakarae, niscaya ami jano yi sihamte gopana karae arau yi sihamte prakasa karae
Manuhe laksya karaa na'ine ye, ami taka srsti karaicho sukrabindura paraa, athaca pichata si prakasya bitandakarai hai parae
Arau si amara bisaye upama racana karae, athaca si nijara srstira katha paharai yaya. Si kaya, ‘asthira bhitarata kone praana sancara karaiba yetiya i jahi-khahi, geli-paci yaba’
koraa, ‘teraemi tata praana sancara karaiba yijane iyaka prathamabara srsti karaiche, arau te'om pratito srsti samparke samyaka paraijnata’
Teraemi tomalokara babe se'ujiya gachara paraa ju'i utpanna karae, phalata tomaloke tara paraa agni prajbalita karaa
Yijane akasasamuha arau prthirai srsti karaiche te'om sihamtara anuraupa akau srsti karaibalai saksama nahayane? Niscaya haya. Te'om mahasrasta, sarbajna
Te'omra bisayato enekuraa ye, te'om yetiya kono bastura iccha karae, tetiya kerala kaya, ‘ha’, phalata se'ito hai yaya
Eteke paraitra arau mahana se'i satta, yara hatata pratyeka bisayara sarbabhauma kartrtba; arau te'omra ocarate'i tomaloka pratyarartita ha’ba
Sapata saraibad'dha phiraistasakalara
tara pichata kathora paraicalakasakalara
arau upadesa grantha tilaratakaraisakalara
niscaya tomalokara ilaha ejana
yijana akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora madhyararti sakalo bastura raba arau udayasthala samuharao raba
Niscaya ami nikatararti akasakhanaka naksatraraajira saundaryarae susobhita karaicho
arau raksa karaicho pratyeka bidraohi cayatanara paraa
Phalata sihamte urd'dhajagatara ekorae suniba noraarae, karana ke'uphalara paraa sihamtara prati niksepa karaa haya (ulkapinda)
sihamtaka khedi pathi'oraara babe, arau sihamtara babe ache abiraama sasti
Kintu hathat konoba'i kiba sunile jbalanta ulkapinda'i tara piche piche khedi yaya
Eteke sihamtaka sudhi coraacona, srstira ksetrata sihamte bechi jatila ne ami ana yibora srsti karaicho se'ibora? Ami sihamtaka dekhuna alatiya matira paraa srsti karaicho
Baram tumi bismaya bodha karaicha, arau sihamte bidraupa karai ache
Arau yetiya sihamtaka upadesa diya haya, tetiya sihamte seya grahana nakarae
Arau yetiya sihamte kono nidarsana dekhe, tetiya sihamte upahasa karae
Arau kaya, ‘e'ito dekhuna suspasta yadura bahirae ana eko nahaya
‘Ami yetiya mrtyubarana karaima lagate mati arau asthita parainata hama, tathapi'o amaka punaraut'thita karaa ha’bane
‘arau amara pitr-purausa sakaloko’
koraa, ‘haya, arau tomaloka ha’ba lanchita’
Eteke seya kerala eta matra pracanda dhamaka, tatksanat sihamte thara lagi ca'i thakiba
Arau sihamte ka’ba, ‘haya! Durbhagya amara! E'ito dekhuna pratidana dirasa’
E'itorae'i phayacalara dina, yi bisaye tomaloke abisbasa karaichila
